title: Romes glory, or, A collection of divers miracles wrought by popish saints, both during their lives and after their deaths collected out of their own authors for information of all true-hearted Protestants ; together with a prefatory discourse declaring the impossibility and folly of such vain impostures.
author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Moses Pitt ...,
